divs: sighting detailswe were 45 mi west of cottonwood, ca. driving east on hiwy 36 just after dusk, after gold mining all day! as we crested a mountain top & my ex employee's girlfriend who was riding in the backseat so she could get some sleep\ as she was getting situated with a blanket & such, she said;(hey! whats that huge planet?)thats right behind us? i looked back thru the rear window and wow!!! there was this huge round object still rising above the mountain top we just drove over! i said isn't that " venus"??? she said i do not know; but now it's drifting left! then it tried to stabelise? but drifted a bit more then 4 or 5 tiny blue lights exited it??? they spred out but basically it appeared they surrounded us? and moved closer in towards us??? as we watched??? we all stood & starred with awwh! at the tiny blue lights, the huge round very bright yellow sphere went down??? slowly untill it disappered behind the mountain top??? we all saw the exact same thing, as we were soo excited we were exchanging questions back and fourth! i have never made a report of things iv'e seen thru out my life, but after that incident: i have seen those tiny blue lights 3 seperate times??? they seem to move in closer & closer directly towards me? then they become even smaller??? wow!!!
Summary: We were leaving a gold hunting daytrip, it was just after sunset as we drove east, behind us, ( a giant bright round object rose up very quickly!) it stopped about 3 ft above mntn top ?
